title: Workshop on Designing Middle School Mathematics Teaching Methods Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics education theory and understanding of online learning tools
context.additional_context: A pre-service teacher training program emphasizing practical competencies to effectively design middle school mathematics pedagogy in blended learning environments.

learning_goals: They can apply the principles of personalization, multimodality, and redundancy required for blended learning design.
They can propose three or more strategies to enhance student engagement when designing integrated online-offline lessons.
They can analyze data derived from the Genie 3 platform case study (concentration rate 93%, increased task-focused time) and incorporate it into actual lesson design.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
